name: Starwulf - Seeker of Secret Space
description:
Since you were a child, you heard a stories about loner space pilot and heroic journey through distant galaxies reaching finally unknown galaxy called secret space. The pilot came back with a ship no-one could believe to exists, but told no-one nothing at its origins. The pilot's name was not known, only the nickname 'Starwulf'. This story haunted on your dreams and you always thought that someday you will follow the pilot's path and become a legend.

Now, as a juvenile pilot with first space ship you are ready to start your journey. Travel from star system to star system, from galaxy to galaxy. Fly through asteroid fields, reach the planet, collect cargo by mining the planet and finally jump through hyperspace to the space station near next planet. Sell the cargo and equip your ship with different weapons, engine parts or upgrade the ship. During your journey collect the clues for your secret destination, the port to the secret space.
